message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,500,000. I believe this reflects its worth and potential.

I appreciate your initial offer, Alice. However, I believe the product's value is closer to $1,000,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $1,250,000. I'm confident we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.

Bob, thanks for your counter-offer. I understand your perspective on the value.  To be fair to both of us, I propose a price of $1,375,000. This reflects a point closer to the true value of the product.

I understand your perspective, Alice, but I still believe the product's value is closer to $1,000,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $1,200,000. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal.
